Desc.entry: Anglican church. Annual events include a Sunrise Service on Easter Sunday, Children's Holiday Club in August and a Christmas Eve candlelight service and midnight mass.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sunday Service at 10am (including Sunday school), 1st Sun in the month at 10.30am (family service), Wed at 10am (Said Service of Holy Communion), 2nd Sun in the month at 12noon (Holy Baptism), Wed 7-8pm, surgery for booking of baptisms, marriage, banns of marriage
